info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 18 at 8:45PM EDT until August 22 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington NC
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...
Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Lumber River near Lumberton.
* WHEN...From late tonight to Friday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 PM EDT Monday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 13.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at water.noaa.gov/wfo/ilm .
The next statement will be issued by Tuesday afternoon.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO FRIDAY MORNING
